name: Nature's Nemesis
description:
Made for ASAP! CYGD 2022

Controls

Mouse - Aim your vines 
Spacebar - Shoot vines
Left Click trees to warp to them
A - Toucan (freezes enemies in place)
S - Snake (bounces enemies back)
D - Panther (scares enemies away)

Credits

Tyler Geer - Concept 
Alexia Mohabir - Team Lead & Design
Gen Heyward - Programming
Dakota Hernandez - Programming
Tyler Rhodes - Art & Animation
Jeff Penny - Music & SFX
